prompts: Create a muscular Pokemon that excels in close combat and has a strong fighting spirit.
I want a blue and yellow Pokemon with multiple arms, showcasing its strength and agility.
Generate a bipedal creature with a humanoid shape, emphasizing its powerful physique and fighting style.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of martial arts with a fierce and determined expression.
Imagine a creature that dominates in battle, with a focus on physical moves and brute strength.
Design a fighting-type Pokemon that has a vibrant color palette and stands out in any environment.
Show me a Pokemon that represents teamwork and strength, with an impressive muscular build.
